skill-p-00: Python- ML, Data Analysis, Data Transforming, Web Back-end

work-p-0: I worked in Business Development and Consumer Experience at Amarin Corporations Public Company Limited, a leading media and lifestyle company in Thailand. My job involves creating dashboards with Django Python frameworks to display summary statistics and visitor counts for trade exhibitions. I also use data visualization techniques to analyze visitor journeys and enhance customer satisfaction.
